channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-7494] "mvn site" build failed on trunk
item.description:
when I using "mvn site" to compile hbase document , it reports missing class MavenReport error:

Jan 04, 2013 12:11:47 PM org.sonatype.guice.bean.reflect.Logs$JULSink warn
WARNING: Error injecting: org.apache.maven.reporting.exec.DefaultMavenReportExecutor

[zhouhh@Hadoop48 trunk]$
I removed site plugin:
[zhouhh@Hadoop48 maven]$ rm -rf ./plugins/maven-site-plugin
or I run " mvn clean install -DskipTests" first, and it's ok. then I run "mvn site",
it reports the same error.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: fix maven.site.version 3.1 missing MavenReport class error of the trunk

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: fix maven.site.version 3.1 missing MavenReport class error of the trunk
